ca.ualberta.team2recipefinder
Class MainActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      ca.ualberta.team2recipefinder.MainActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
View<RecipeModel>
public class MainActivity
extends Activity
implements View<RecipeModel>

MainActivity is the main activity for the recipefinder application. It displays the users current saved recipes and provides an interface to reach other areas of the application.

Author:
cmput-301 team 2
